author: arkurth
msg: Added enable_dhcp subroutine to Linux.pm. This is called from pre_capture. It resolves the problem caused by MAC addresses remaining in the ifcfg-eth* files when an image is captured.
Cleaned up pre_capture. Created shutdown subroutine. Also created restart_network_interface subroutine.
